text: some people think we're crazy for being
out here because most our viewers take
the Snowbird route and travel away from
the snow but we don't travel to find
fair weather we travel to find adventure
so bundle up grab your gear and join us
breck is easy we walk out of the
campground hop on the free bus and
within minutes we're at the base of the
mountain it's gonna be a good day up on
the mountain it's all about the fresh
air being surrounded by nature and
pushing our limits for me snowboarding's
like flying strapped on this board
lie down the mountain feeling we only
get a couple times a year I love the
desert there's no place I'd rather be
right now
I love the camaraderie that comes along
with being here whether I'm making my
way down the mountain with fellow
travelers or getting a tip from the
locals
we're all here for the same thing to
have a good time
from the highest lifts in North America
to the wide-open spaces of peak six
Breck is truly a mountain with a run for
everybody even the extreme being up here
with these amazing views this is why we
head to the mountains for the winter
there's nothing better than heading home
exhausting and yets so excited for it to
be the next day to see you and all over
again
